content.text:
# Visa requirements for Democratic Republic of the Congo citizens

]]
Visa requirements for Democratic Republic of the Congo citizens are administrative entry restrictions by the authorities of other states placed on citizens of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
As of 2025, Democratic Republic of the Congo citizens had visa-free or visa on arrival access to 42 countries and territories, ranking the Democratic Republic of the Congo passport 96th in the world according to the Henley Passport Index.
Visa requirements map
